data.actual_result: The color doesn't show up anymore in the color picker
data.expected_result: The color should be available in the color picker
data.short_description: The last color from color picker (role colors) doesn't show up anymore if you selected another color and then want to change it back
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a new server (or go to one where you're owner/admin) - Go to server settings, then to roles section - Create a new role - Open the color picker; Observe the current color of role - Change the role color to something else - Open the color picker again; Observe: the last color from picker (the default one which the role had when it was created) doesn't show up anymore
